title: Flee: A Short Story
description: Flee: A Short Story is the prequel to the Soul Eaters: An African Elemental Novel. After the death of her grandmother, Shania Moore, a 27-year old African-American woman is tormented by her ex-boyfriend and a paranormal serial killer. When Shania falls into a dream realm and connects with an ancient African Goddess, her earth magic awakens. Shania realizes that in order to save her daughterâ€™s magical soul, she must run into the arms of the white man that she lied to about having an abortion and stood up at the altar ten years before.
author: Alicia McCalla
